## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fa2efc28ecdebc90e41edd50503e199984f68d05cb13edab8b6e8d503d18e75c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'smsobfuscate' @ 1.0.1 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
